attributes.description:
Stylish design and cutting-edge performance are just the beginning of your journey with the exciting Kia Sportage!
Turning heads left, right and centre
Tapering headlights show off the Sportage's aerodynamic capabilities like never before, giving you a car that is a stylish crowd pleaser. The distinctive horizontal rear lights offer maximum visibility for those driving behind you, while still encapsulating the Sportage’s signature sporty look.
Performance like never before
The KIA Sportage offers you all the functionality of an SUV with the style and performance of a sports car with a dynamic engine performances, the KIA Sportage drives smoothly and handles responsively. 
Adventure and interior comfort added with you in mind

attributes.description:
At Kia Alberton, we pride ourselves on delivering high quality pre-owned vehicles. All our vehicles undergo a thorough 125-point quality check, roadworthy and valet.  

The one thing we pride ourselves in more than anything is EXCELLENT CUSTOMER SERVICE. When buying a vehicle from us, you join the Kia Alberton Family and family look after each other. We will structure a package that will not only suit your needs but your pocket too.   

Call now and one of our experienced Sales Executives will gladly bring the vehicle out to you, or welcome you to our showroom to view and test drive the vehicle. 

Finance can be arranged through all major financial institutions, nationwide delivery available and all trade-in's accepted subject to view. Price excludes on the road fees.

attributes.description:
At Kia Silverlakes we pride ourselves on delivering quality used vehicles to our clients. All our vehicles undergo a 125 quality point check, roadworthy and valet before being displayed on our showroom floor. All vehicles are delivered with a full service history and are accident free. The one thing we pride ourselves in more than anything is EXCELLENT CUSTOMER SERVICE. When buying a vehicle from us, you join the Kia Family and family look after each other. We will tailor make a package that will not only suit your needs but your pocket too. We deal through all major financial institutions and always pride ourselves on giving you the best deal. CALL NOW and one of our experienced Sales Executives will gladly bring the vehicle out to you to test drive from the comfort of your own home or workplace. CALL NOW and you could be driving off in the car of yours dreams.

Nationwide delivery. All Trade-in's welcome. Finance can be arranged, Contact us today! Price excludes on the road fees.

attributes.description:
5 Year / 150 000 Km Warranty & 5 Year / 60 000 Km Service Plan.
1 Million Km Or 10 Year Engine Warranty!


Features:
G-Type Dynamic Daytime Running Lights,
Led Teq Xenon Headlights,
Diamond Shaped Front Grill,
17” Gloss Black Alloys,
6 - Way Adjustment Electric Driver Seat,
Intelligent Climate Control,
10.25” Suspended Touch Screen Display,
Keyless Entry & One Touch Start Technology,
Apple CarPlay / Android Auto,
Hello Tiggo Intelligent Voice Control,
Reverse Camera,
Tyre Pressure Monitoring System,
Cooling Centre Console,
Black Leather Seats (ISOFIX),
Rear Parking Sensors,
Hill Start Assist / Hill Descent Control,
Sunroof,
Cruise Control,
Multi Functional Steering Wheel,
Virtual Cockpit.

Pop your Chery in the new ALL-NEW Tiggo 4 Pro with Intelligent Voice Assistance, Intelligent Climate Control, and a host of other cutting-edge features. The SUV that commands attention everywhere you go! This new Chery in Elite specification will leave you speechless with its excellent fuel efficiency, class-leading interior build, and jaw-dropping Warranty!

Nationwide delivery.
T&C's
